installation\/index.md.Il faut Docker pour faire tourner Jeedom: You need Docker to run Jeedom, the first one Docker Mysql which will contain the database and a second one which contains Jeedom
installation\/index.md.Dans le champ de recherche tapez \"mysql: In the search field type "mysql", select mysql and click on download
installation\/index.md.Validez ensuite la demande de version, l: Then validate the version request, the best being to take the latest version
installation\/index.md.Cliquez ensuite sur image, ici vous pouv: Then click on image, here you can follow the progress of the download (can take several tens of minutes)
installation\/index.md.Une fois terminé, cliquez sur l'image pu: Once finished, click on the image then launch
installation\/index.md.Donnez un nom à votre mysql ainsi qu'un: Give a name to your mysql as well as a local port redirected to port 3306 of the container, then do the following
installation\/index.md.Puis sur \"Ajouter un dossier\", et là,: Then on "Add a folder", and there, put the desired folder on the Synology side (it is in this folder that there will be all the files in the database) and / var / lib / mysql on the container side (be careful uncheck "Read only")
installation\/index.md.Cliquez sur \"Environnement\" puis \"Ajo: Click on "Environment" then "Add a variable" and putting in "Variable
installation\/index.md.MYSQL\\_ROOT\\_PASSWORD\" et dans valeur: MYSQL \ _ROOT \ _PASSWORD "and in value put the desired BDD password (it will be used later)
installation\/index.md.Cochez \"Exécuter ce conteneur lorsque l: Check "Run this container when the wizard has finished" then click on "Apply
installation\/index.md.Dans le champ de recherche, tapez \"jeed: In the search field, type "jeedom", select jeedom / jeedom and click on download
installation\/index.md.Validez ensuite la demande de version, l: Then validate the version request, the best being to take the last
installation\/index.md.Une fois terminé, cliquez sur l'image pu: Once finished, click on the image then launch
installation\/index.md.Donnez un nom à votre jeedom ainsi qu'un: Give a name to your jeedom as well as a local port redirected to port 80 (here 9080) and one to 22 (here 9022) of the container, then do the following
installation\/index.md.Choisissez un dossier sur votre Synology: Choose a folder on your Synology (it is in this folder that there will be all jeedom files), be careful to uncheck "Read only
installation\/index.md.Dans chemin d'accès, mettez \/var\/www\/: In path, put / var / www / html then click on "Environment
installation\/index.md.Cochez \"Exécuter le conteneur à l'aide: Check "Run the container using elevated privileges" then validate everything
installation\/index.md.Il existe 3 paramètres optionnel de conf: There are 3 optional configuration parameters, these parameters must be passed as an environment variable
installation\/index.md.permet de changer le port par défaut (80: allows to change the default port (80) for listening to the web server
installation\/index.md.permet de changer le port par défaut (22: allows to change the default port (22) for listening to ssh
installation\/index.md.indique que le résaux est en mode host: indicates that the network is in host mode
installation\/index.md.Certain plugin on besoin d'avoir le broa: Certain plugin you need to have the network broadcast (Xioami plugin type), for that you must ABSOLUTELY switch to the network in host mode (only possible during creation), change the default listening port of the web server and ssh by unused ports (type 9080 for the web server and 9022 for the ssh), and set the variable MODE_HOST to 1
installation\/index.md.Il vous faut maintenant installer Jeedom: Now you need to install Jeedom, it's very simple, go to IP \ _NAS
installation\/index.md.Remplissez les champs en fonction de vot: Fill in the fields according to your configuration (configuration of the Docker mysql installed previously) and validate
installation\/index.md.L'addresse IP de la BDD est l'addresse I: The IP address of the BDD is the IP address of the NAS, the port is the one redirected from the Docker Mysql, the password is the one put in the Docker Mysql
installation\/index.md.Le nom d'utilisateur est root et le nom: Username is root and base name is whatever you want (Jeedom recommended)
installation\/index.md.Si vous voulez un accès SSH, il vous fau: If you want SSH access, you need in ports to redirect a local port to port 22 of the container, the SSH identifiers are root / jeedom
installation\/index.md.Vous pouvez changer le mot de passe en i: You can change the password by setting the environment variable ROOT \ _PASSWORD to the value of the desired password

installation\/index.md.7 de Jeedom (mais Jessie reste parfaitem: 7 of Jeedom (but Jessie remains perfectly functional)
installation\/index.md.Si vous ne maîtrisez pas un minimum les: If you do not master Linux environments a minimum, we advise you to go on an official image (OVF) or the use of a Mini + or Smart (available soon)
installation\/index.md.Le script d'installation peut être dange: Installation script can be dangerous because it assumes your system is blank
installation\/index.md.Si ce n'est pas le cas merci de lire le: If not, please read the script and install by hand.
installation\/index.md.Connectez-vous en SSH à votre système et: Connect in SSH to your system and do
